section.title: Programming Model Overview
section.para: The RLS provides a Client API for C and Java based clients. The RLS Client C API is provided in the form of a library (e.g., .so file). Any installation of RLS will include the shared library as part of the $GLOBUS_LOCATION/include and $GLOBUS_LOCATION/lib directories. The RLS Client Java API depends on the the commons-logging and cog-jglobus libraries which typically located in the $GLOBUS_LOCATION/lib/common folder. The RLS Java Client jar is named globus_rls_client.jar and is typically installed in the $GLOBUS_LOCATION/lib folder.
